text: John Cottle (born 11 August 1949) is a New Zealand equestrian. He competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of New Zealand Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Wellington City
title: John Cottle
